item.title: Using Hugo as the new static site generator
item.description: Four years since my last blogpost and a very crappy old style of the site, I have decided completely revamp it. My first thoughts were: You need a new static site generator and it has to be written in your favourite programming language (for now, this is JavaScript). After some googling and tinkering I came to a very different conclusion: Not the programming language or the features of the generator are important to me, but the available themes!
